abstract: A picture caption on Saturday with an article about General Electric’s quarterly earnings may have left the incorrect impression that G.E. was selling appliances in Iran. While the picture, from The Associated Press, showed the company’s products in a Tehran appliance store, General Electric said that the sales were unauthorized and that the company had stopped supplying the distributor who provided the appliances to the Tehran store.

lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Saturday with an article about General Electric’s quarterly earnings may have left the incorrect impression that G.E. was selling appliances in Iran. While the picture, from The Associated Press, showed the company’s products in a Tehran appliance store, General Electric said that the sales were unauthorized and that the company had stopped supplying the distributor who provided the appliances to the Tehran store.
